text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
PharmaceuticalAdviceHMW 0..*Base[HMW] Logical Model for Pharmaceutical Advice
identifier 0..1IdentifierThe business identifier(s) for the medication prescription
patient 1..1Reference(Patient)The person for which the medication is prescribed.
status 1..1codeStatus of the prescription
statusReason 0..*CodeableConceptReason for current prescription status
product[x] 1..1Product prescribed
productCodeableConceptCodeableConcept
productReferenceReference(Medication)
encounter 0..1Reference(Encounter)Encounter on which the medication was prescribed
requester 0..1Reference(Practitioner)Who made the prescription
reason 0..*Reference(Condition | Observation)Reason or indication for ordering or not ordering the product
dosageInstruction 0..*DosageHow the product should be taken/administered
note 0..*AnnotationAdditional Information about the prescription
date 0..1dateTimeWhen advice was initially made
prescription 0..1Reference(MedicationRequest)The prescription identification
Observation 0..1string
problems 0..1string
summaryOf 0..1string
physicianPharmacistDiscussion 0..1string
Decision 0..1string
pharmacist 0..1string
pharmacy 0..1string
substitutionStatus 0..1string
